snippet: In December, workers with bachelor's degrees or other postsecondary educations gained jobs. On the other hand, the number of workers with high school diplomas or less who were employed fell.
abstract: In December, workers with bachelor's degrees or other postsecondary educations gained jobs. On the other hand, the number of workers with high school diplomas or less who were employed fell.

headline.main: College-Educated Workers Gaining Jobs, High School Grads Losing Them
